What will and will not be supported with regards to Village Halls.

New Village Halls and other works to existing village halls eg:

  • Building modification for disabled access/facilities.
  • Replacement windows.
  • Roof repairs.
  • Re-wiring.

Key conditions

Submission of application form and supporting documents

Exclusions

Village Hall grant will not be awarded for:

  • Projects costing less than £ enter amount, unless the work is required to comply with statutory regulations.
  • Provision or renewal of specialist facilities for sports, arts or other activities.
  • Provision or renewal of car parking facilities unless these are required to meet regulations or such facilities do not already exist.

Any upper or lower limits on grant size

  • With regard new village halls, grants of up to one third of eligible costs may be awarded to a maximum payment of £ enter amount
  • For major works (i.e. costing over £ enter amount) grants of one third of the eligible cost may be awarded up to a maximum of £ enter amount
  • For smaller works (i.e. £ enter amount - £ enter amount) grants of up to one third of the costs may be awarded up to a maximum of £ enter amount

How to apply for a grant

Complete and return the Village Hall Grant application form along with a copy of the Village Hall's most recent accounts and a copy of a quotation or estimate for the work. Please contact us on the details above for an application form.

Date by which grant should be submitted

Ongoing.
